title: (x) futuristic techy soft sans - Neo Tech {Yves}
content:
Does anyone know what the name of this font is? I have seen it before at some foundry, but I don't remeber whereâ€¦

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sans.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603042957/http:/typophile.com/files/sans.jpg) | 7.51 KB |
author: oystein

comments.content: Oh boy these [Fonts.com showings](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603042957/http:/www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=415098) suck _big time_. [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603042957/http:/monotype.co.uk/neosansAMT/)'s the presentation on the Monotype website.

That's the one, and yes, it's a beauty!

Thanks Yves.
